Since webpack v3.8.0, the stats property is validated more strictly by webpack.  webpack-dev-server is mutating this stats object by adding a colors property, which is an object and doesn't match the webpack configuration schema, causing a fatal error. The easy fix is to not mutate the stats object, so webpack isn't breaking with a fatal error.  But we may also consider setting a valid colors property.
